name: Root Trial Balance
query:
SELECT
    gle.fiscal_year AS "Fiscal Year:Data:80",
    gle.company AS "Company:Data:220",
    gle.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:100",
    gle.account AS "Account:Data:380",
    SUM(gle.debit) AS "Debit:Currency:140",
    SUM(gle.credit) AS "Credit:Currency:140",
    gle.finance_book AS "Finance Book:Link/Finance Book:140"
FROM `tabGL Entry` gle
INNER JOIN `tabAccount` acc ON acc.name = gle.account
WHERE
    (acc.parent_account IS NULL OR acc.parent_account = '')
GROUP BY
    gle.fiscal_year,
    gle.company,
    gle.posting_date,
    gle.account
ORDER BY
    gle.fiscal_year,
    gle.company,
    gle.posting_date,
    gle.account;
